page.title: 07Religion in the area
page.content: In our area the Christians are divided into the Church of England and Methodist.There are a few Roman Catholic families in Flimby.Their children go to their own schools.The Church of England have their own church halls.Another name for the Methodists is the Wesleyans. .The people who do not believe in God are called Atheists.Church of England and Methodist people are all Protestants. These are the number of percentages about religion in Flimby.Church of England 55%,Methodist 26%,None 15%.Baptism 91%,Attendance Each week 37%,Few times 31%,Special Occasions 31%.The nearest Roman Catholic school to Flimby is Saint Patricks at Maryport.So the percentages tell us that religion was very strong in Flimby.
